source.sqlReaderQuery: select s.id,e.name,e.salary,s.age from dbo.student as s left join dbo.employee as e on s.id = e.id

scripts.text: alter table orders add city varchar(100)

sqlReaderQuery.value: @replace( 'select OrderDate,ProductKey, EnglishPoductName,SalesName from orderes where country = ''countryName'' ','countryName' ,variables('Country') )

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT COUNTRY, REGION FROM INVOICE 
ORDER BY COUNTRY , REGION

sqlReaderQuery.value: @replace(replace( 'select [year] ,[month],invoiceId,sales from invoice where country = ''COUNTRYNAME'' and region = ''REGIONNAME''', 'COUNTRYNAME' , variables('country')), 'REGIONNAME' , variables('region') )
